scripts.generate: npm run clean-frontend & wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/openapi && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-key v3.0 --skip-validate-spec -g typescript-angular -i http://localhost:8080/q/openapi -o frontend/src/app/generated/api --global-property models
scripts.watch-api: nodemon -e java --watch backend/src/main/java -x "npm run package && npm run generate"
